trans-unit.source: Allows text engine clients to map a text source character index to the corresponding <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: Permite que clientes do mecanismo de texto mapeiem um índice de caracteres de origem de texto para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> correspondente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun> object allows a text engine client to obtain glyph information for a text source character such as the glyph's cluster map, glyph indices, and glyph typeface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun> objeto permite que um cliente de mecanismo de texto obter informações de glifo de um caractere de fonte do texto, como o tipo de glifo, índices de glyph e mapa de cluster do glifo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> that corresponds to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> que corresponde ao objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text source character index that corresponds to the beginning of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice de caracteres de origem de texto que corresponde ao início do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the text source character index.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> valor que representa o índice de caracteres de origem do texto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text source character length that corresponds to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comprimento de caracteres de origem de texto que corresponde ao objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the length of the text source character.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> valor que representa o comprimento do caractere de fonte do texto.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun.TextSourceLength%2A> property is not necessarily equal to the character count of the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun.TextSourceLength%2A> propriedade não é necessariamente igual à contagem de caracteres do <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>.
